hadiths.text: Jabir said:"Ali came from collecting Zakah and the Prophet said to him: "For what have you entered Ihram, O 'Ali?' he said: 'For that for which the Messenger of Allah entered Ihram.' He said: 'Then offer the Hadi and remain in Ihram as you are.' So 'Ali offered a Hadi

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَجِّ بِغَيْرِ نِيَّةٍ يَقْصِدُهُ الْمُحْرِمُ .
chapter.eng-name: Hajj without any clear intention on the part of the Pilgrim in Ihram
